title: [Vornavis, Outlands Road]
description: Like a pale sentinel in the night, a white granite obelisk stands at the side of the trail.  The once crisp corners of the stone's faces have been worn and rounded by wind and weather.

A white granite obelisk stands at the side of the trail, its angled peak adorned with the impure white of recently-bestowed droppings.  The once crisp corners of the stone's faces have been worn and rounded by wind and weather.
